alert.note: Alert for Upper Koyukuk Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 21 at 4:10PM AKST until December 23 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Strong winds, cold wind chills and blowing snow. Winds gusting to 45 mph. Wind chills to 50 below. Blowing and drifting snow, * WHERE...Upper Koyukuk Valley over summits. * WHEN...Until noon AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel over Dalton Highway Summits will be difficult. Strong winds blowing over summits will cause blowing snow that could reduce visibility. Large snow drifts will form. The dangerously cold wind chills to 50 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
